title: Horror Slasher & Investigation Music Pack
description: 10 Tracks for Horror and Investigation Games, Creepy and Sadness
longDescription:
What's in this pack ?


  • 10 originals songs (With variations loops and tracks)
  • 86 multi instruments seamless loops
  • HQ (Wav)


An OST in the spirit of Horror and Investigation games and the links between like Polar or Noir Police Story, exploration in Darkness of mind, Drama, Torture,...

Inspirated by Horror, Thriller, Slasher, Noir Story about Police, Investigation, creepy, spychological, etc...

The second and the tenth track are quite similar, offer modal option, made as a soundtrack with theme and identity

Sampler : Listen here

List of all tracks : Listen here


  • Track 01 : Welcome In The Dark Killer's Lair
  • Track 02 : A Dark Killer Theme
  • Track 03 : Investigation Calm & Dark Exploration
  • Track 04 : Investigation Revelation Intensity & Sadness
  • Track 05 : Investigation Tortured & Bad Dream
  • Track 06 : Killing Time & Hunting For A Dark Killer
  • Track 07 : A Victime In The Dark Killer's Familly
  • Track 08 : Interrogatory Of A Dark Killer
  • Track 09 : A Travel In A Dark Killer's Mind
  • Track 10 : A Dark Killer Origins Theme


composed by Rafdows from CMFAFVG
